title: Windows 10 anniversary update ( Vertical sync problem )
body:
Since i updated my pc to the latest windows anniversary update every time i turn on the Vertical sync so my monitor stops showing me waves on the screen while am playing the game my game play now becomes laggy and has stuttering in it 

What should i do ?

How do i fix it?

i need vertical sync to work again because i cant play without it 

Before the update everything was perfect and now i have this problem 

PLEASE HELP RIOT

replies.body:
We've seen this happen a few times after this update to Windows. It can typically be resolved by either [disabling the Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) in the xbox app, or by [reinstalling your graphics driver](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1).

Let me know if either of those steps worked.
